Class provides routine for permits.

add_permit_for_object ( $  Permit,
$  Object,
$  ObjectType = 'page' 
)

Function adds permit for object.

Parameters:
$Permit - Permit to add.
$Object - Object.
$ObjectType - Type of the object (may be menu, user, page).
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 853 of file permit_access.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        /* dropping local cache */
                        $this->PermitsCache = array();
                  
                        $Permit = $this->Security->get( $Permit , 'command' );
                        $Object = $this->Security->get( $Object , 'string' );
                        $ObjectType = $this->Security->get( $ObjectType , 'command' );
                        
                        $Permits = array();
                  
                        if( $ObjectType == 'page' || $ObjectType == 'menu' )
                        {
                              $PermitFilePath = '';
                              $Prefix = $ObjectType == 'menu' ? 'm' : '';
                              $Prefix = $ObjectType == 'page' ? 'p' : $Prefix;
                              
                              $PermitFilePath = dirname( __FILE__ ).'/data/'.$Prefix.$Object;
      
                              $Permits = array();
      
                              if( file_exists( $PermitFilePath ) )
                              {
                                    $Permits = $DataManipulator->get_file_content( $PermitFilePath , ',' );
                                    $Permits = $Permits[ 0 ];
                              }
                              
                              if( array_search( $Permit , $Permits ) == false )
                              {
                                    $Permits [] = $Permit;
                                    $Permits = implode( ',' , $Permits );
                                    $this->CachedMultyFS->file_put_contents( $PermitFilePath , $Permits );
                              }
                        }
                        elseif( $ObjectType == 'user' || $ObjectType == 'group' )
                        {
                        
                              $Permit = $this->unsafe_select( "permit LIKE '$Permit'" );
                              $Permit = $Permit[ 0 ];
                              $this->Link->create_link( $Object , $Permit->id , $ObjectType , 'permit' , true );
                              return;
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 1220 of file permit_access.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        /* dropping local cache */
                        $this->PermitsCache = array();
                  
                        $Group = $this->Security->get( $Group , 'command' );
                        $Group = $this->GroupAccess->unsafe_select( "title LIKE '$Group'" );
                        if( isset( $Group[ 0 ] ) === false )
                        {
                              throw( new Exception( "Group \"$Group\" was not found" ) );
                        }
                        
                        $Group = $Group[ 0 ];
                        $Object = $this->Security->get( $Object , 'string' );
                        $ObjectType = $this->Security->get( $ObjectType , 'command' );
                        
                        $this->Link->delete_link( $Object , get_field( $Group , 'id' ) , $ObjectType , 'group' );
                  }

Definition at line 215 of file permit_access.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Permit = $this->Security->get( $Permit , 'command' );
                        
                        $Items = $this->unsafe_select( "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND permit LIKE '$Permit'" );
                        
                        if( count( $Items ) == 0 )
                        {
                              throw( new Exception( "Permit $Permit was not found" ) );
                        }
                        
                        return( $Items[ 0 ] );
                  }

$  AddDefaultPermit = true 
)

Returns:
List of permits.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 800 of file permit_access.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $gid = $this->Security->get( $gid , 'integer' );
                        
                        $Links = $this->Link->get_links( $gid , false , 'group' , 'permit' );

                        $ids = get_field_ex( $Links , 'object2_id' );
                        
                        if( count( $ids ) !== 0 )
                        {
                              $Permits = $this->select_list( implode( ',' , $ids ) );
                                    
                              return( get_field_ex( $Permits , 'permit' ) );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              return( array() );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }

get_permits_for_menu ( $  mid  ) 

Function returns permits for the menu.

Parameters:
$mid - Menu's id.
Note:
If permits were not defined at all, then all permits for that menu are defaulted to 'admin'.
Returns:
List of permits.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 700 of file permit_access.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $mid = $this->Security->get( $mid , 'integer' );
                        
                        $Links = $this->Link->get_links( $mid , false , 'menu' , 'permit' );
                        
                        if( count( $Links ) == 0 )
                        {
                              return( array( 'admin' ) );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              $ids = get_field_ex( $Links , 'object2_id' );
                              $Permits = $this->select_list( $ids );
                              return( get_field_ex( $Permits , 'permit' ) );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

get_permits_for_user ( $  uid  ) 

Function returns permits for the user.

Parameters:
$uid - User's id.
Note:
If permits were not defined at all, then user has 'public' permit.
Returns:
List of permits.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 595 of file permit_access.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $uid = ( $uid === false ) ? $this->UserAlgorithms->get_id() : $this->Security->get( $uid , 'integer' );

                        $Links = $this->Link->get_links( $uid , false , 'user' , 'permit' );
                        
                        if( isset( $Links[ 0 ] ) === false )
                        {
                              return( array( 'public' ) );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              $ids = get_field_ex( $Links , 'object2_id' );
                              $Permits = $this->select_list( implode( ',' , $ids ) );
                              
                              return( get_field_ex( $Permits , 'permit' ) );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

get_permits_for_user_group ( $  uid  ) 

Function returns permits for the user.

Parameters:
$uid - User's id.
Returns:
List of permits.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 643 of file permit_access.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $uid = ( $uid === false ) ? $this->UserAlgorithms->get_id() : $this->Security->get( $uid , 'integer' );

                        $LinkType = $this->Link->get_link_type( 'user' , 'group' );
                        $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
                        $Items = $this->Database->select( 
                              '`umx_group`.id' , 
                              '`umx_group` , umx_link' , 
                              "umx_group.id = umx_link.object2_id AND ".
                                    "umx_link.object1_id = $uid AND type = $LinkType" 
                        );

                        $Permits = array();
                        
                        foreach( $Items as $i )
                        {
                              $Permits = array_merge( $Permits , $this->get_permits_for_group( $i->id ) );
                        }
                        
                        return( array_unique( $Permits ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

toggle_group_for_object ( $  Group,
$  Object,
$  ObjectType = 'page' 
)

Function toggles group for object.

Parameters:
$Group - Group to add.
$Object - Object.
$ObjectType - Type of the object (may be menu, user, page).
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 1153 of file permit_access.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        /* dropping local cache */
                        $this->PermitsCache = array();
                  
                        $Group = $this->Security->get( $Group , 'command' );
                        $Group = $this->GroupAccess->unsafe_select( "title LIKE '$Group'" );
                        if( isset( $Group[ 0 ] ) === false )
                        {
                              throw( new Exception( "Group \"$Group\" was not found" ) );
                        }
                        
                        $Group = $Group[ 0 ];
                        $Object = $this->Security->get( $Object , 'string' );
                        $ObjectType = $this->Security->get( $ObjectType , 'command' );
                        
                        if( is_array( $Object ) === false )
                        {
                              $Object = array( $Object );
                        }
                        
                        foreach( $Object as $i => $id )
                        {
                              if( $this->Link->link_exists( $id , get_field( $Group , 'id' ) , $ObjectType , 'group' ) )
                              {
                                    $this->Link->delete_link( $id , get_field( $Group , 'id' ) , $ObjectType , 'group' );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $this->Link->create_link( $id , get_field( $Group , 'id' ) , $ObjectType , 'group' , true );
                              }
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

                              throw( new Exception( "Permit \"$Permit\" was not found" ) );
                        }
                        
                        $Permit = $Permit[ 0 ];
                        $Object = $this->Security->get( $Object , 'string' );
                        $ObjectType = $this->Security->get( $ObjectType , 'command' );
                        
                        if( is_array( $Object ) === false )
                        {
                              $Object = array( $Object );
                        }
                        
                        foreach( $Object as $i => $id )
                        {
                              if( $this->Link->link_exists( $id , get_field( $Permit , 'id' ) , $ObjectType , 'permit' ) )
                              {
                                    $this->Link->delete_link( $id , get_field( $Permit , 'id' ) , $ObjectType , 'permit' );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $this->Link->create_link( $id , get_field( $Permit , 'id' ) , $ObjectType , 'permit' , true );
                              }
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

                  {
                        $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );

                              '*' , 
                              $this->NativeTable , 
                              "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND $Condition" 
                        );
                        
                        foreach( $Records as $k => $v )
                        {
                              $Records[ $k ]->permit = htmlspecialchars_decode( $Records[ $k ]->permit , ENT_QUOTES );
                              $Records[ $k ]->comment = htmlspecialchars_decode( $Records[ $k ]->comment , ENT_QUOTES );
                        }
                        
                        return( $Records );
                  }

                              $Record , 'permit:command;comment:string' , 'allow_not_set' 
                        );

                                    $this->NativeTable ,
